nodes.text: Sinta IV was an astronomical object that held the fourth orbital position around the star Sinta, located in the Mid Rim. It was the homeworld of the Ovissian Boolio, who worked as an overseer at the Sinta Glacier Colony, a mining colony on the Sinta Glacier ice asteroid that orbited the same star.
Sinta IV was mentioned in the 2019 reference book Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker: The Visual Dictionary, written by Pablo Hidalgo.
